1: The wound is the place where the Light enters you. - Rumi
2: Out beyond ideas of wrongdoing and rightdoing there is a field. I'll meet you there. When the soul lies down in that grass the world is too full to talk about. - Rumi
3: Stop acting so small. You are the universe in ecstatic motion. - Rumi
4: Only from the heart can you touch the sky. - Rumi
5: Be melting snow. Wash yourself of yourself. - Rumi
6: When you do things from your soul, you feel a river moving in you, a joy. - Rumi
7: As you start to walk out on the way, the way appears. - Rumi
8: Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along. - Rumi
9: The cure for pain is in the pain. - Rumi
